wordpressPost.title: Thank you – see you next year
wordpressPost.content:
Øya 2012 is just over. Through four eventful days in the Medieval Park and a huge amount of club shows, thousands of people enjoyed great music. The concerts have been well attended throughout the festival. Our audience really knows how to create a good atmosphere. The last two days we have also had some of this year’s finest summer days. It has been a wonderful festival from Tuesdays club shows to Sondre Lerche’s opening concert in the park to Bon Iver’s and Karpe Diem’s closing shows.

We have gotten great feedback from the audience and performers. There are numerous good reviews of the concerts at Øya 2012. This is very inspiring, as we will soon start the first preparations for next year’s festival.

It’s time to thank volunteers, artists, audiences and partners for the most fantastic working week we can remember. Our goal was to make the best Øya ever, and we believe we did just that. This year’s festival must have beaten the Norwegian record in the festival fun.

 

foto: Ihne Pedersen

messages.404.title: Hmm, den siden fant vi ikke (404)
messages.errorboundary.desc: Vi setter utrolig stor pris på om du vil hjelpe oss med å rapportere feilen, slik at vi kan få fikset den så fort som mulig. Tusen takk!
messages.errorboundary.title: Beklager, noe gikk galt

messages.newsletter.consentText: Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding om at den ikke er aktiv.
messages.newsletter.title: Meld deg på nyhetsbrevet
